title: Fixed the following bugs:
message:
Fixed the following bugs:
- The refresh button missing from the ActionBar (caused by a rouge AI).
- The back button in the ActionBar now reuses Activities instead of always creating new ones. New ones are now only created, if one of the viewer Activities is launched from outside the OlydorfApp (not possible, yet).
- An error where the current meal of the day in the Special tab of the Bierstube section would not be displayed due to the shittyness of the old Java Date API (and me being too lazy to actually read the JavaDocs).
- Issues with the custom deserializers for organizations and daily meals caused by server-side changes of the API.

title: Added a few extra dependencies for Resteasy client functionality, caching in RAM…
message: Added a few extra dependencies for Resteasy client functionality, caching in RAM as well as on disk. The compiled app is now split across multiple .dex files due to big dependencies, leading to longer build times. A new model structure has been implemented. A ResourceManager skeleton has been created, which can be called from within an async task to provide the content for the views.
